text: Hiroshi Mitome (born 30 August 1960) is a Japanese rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Japan Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers at the 1990 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1990 Asian Games
title: Hiroshi Mitome
